backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining Sector and Product types, seeding initial data, and exposing query functions for listing, filtering, and searching products and sectors.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files and components for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with custom color tokens and background behavior.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps pages in SiteLayout and RouteTransition.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductC: Reusable product card displaying product details, advantages, disadvantages, and link to the product page.
Component applying magnetic hover movement based on cursor position with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/motion/RouteTran: Wraps children in a div that animates opacity and vertical position on route changes using router subscriptions.
frontend/src/components/motion/useInerti: Hook enabling smooth scrolling unless reduced-motion is preferred, restoring defaults on cleanup.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Biogra: Scroll-driven biography section that animates titles and content visibility based on scroll progress.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Hero3D: Renders an interactive Three.js particle sphere with a fallback for low-performance devices.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/MediaP: Displays a responsive grid of portrait images with hover scaling and gradient overlay effects.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Shows a grid of video cards with playable videos, hover overlay, and titles.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Skills: Presents a grid of skill cards with icons, colors, and hover animations.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/useHer: Determines whether to render full 3D hero based on motion preference, device type, and hardware concurrency.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/useScr: Hook computing scroll progress of an element using its viewport position and requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the global layout with cyber background, sticky glass header, navigation links, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalog.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching sectors and products from the backend actor with various filters.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme variables for light/dark modes, glassmorphism utilities, and base typography and layout styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutContactPage.tsx: Renders an about and contact page with media sections, mission, expertise, and detailed contact cards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with a 3D hero section, biography scrollytelling, skills showcase, and featured products and sectors.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product information including pricing, advantages, disadvantages, and related sector, with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/SectorPage.tsx: React page that loads a sector by ID, filters products by search term, and displays results with loading skeletons and product cards.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the portfolio site's vision, features, architecture notes, and requirement mappings.
